mentionedBy.name: Unity Software Inc.
mentionedBy.notes: Versatile engine for 2D and lightweight 3D games. Released in 2016. Offers integrated IDE. Highly efficient for mobile game development. Particularly favored in China and Southeast Asia markets.

mentionedBy.name: Unity Software Inc.
mentionedBy.notes: Released 2016 by Cocos 2D makers. Focused on content creation for 2D and 3D games. Full production workflow tools, real-time debugging, large project support, and animation editing. Supports iOS, Android, Windows, Mac, Web, and mini-game platforms.
